'''Rosemary''' is an [[NPC]] in the [[City of Mondstadt]]. She can be found outside the city's front gate with her husband [[Parsley]], watching over their son [[Sage]].

Based on her dialogue with Parsley, the two of them either hail from [[Snezhnaya]] and eventually moved to Mondstadt, or journeyed to Snezhnaya together before settling in Mondstadt.

==Trivia==
* [[Parsley]], Rosemary, and [[Sage]] are all named after herbs. This may be a reference to the lyrics of some versions of the traditional English ballad, {{w|Scarborough Fair (ballad)|Scarborough Fair}}, in which the line "Parsley, sage, rosemary, and thyme" form part of the refrain.
